message.entry: Number of sides must be a positive integer larger than or equal to 3.
'SideLength' parameter is not supported when 'Radius' is specified.
Unable to create polyshape with specified parameters.
'Center' value must be a real, finite, numeric row vector with 2 elements.
'Radius' value must be a real, positive, and finite scalar.
Unable to create polyshape because ''{0}'' value is too small.
Unable to create polyshape because ''{0}'' value is too large.
'SideLength' value must be a real, positive, and finite scalar.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Parameter names and values must occur in pairs.
Unable to create polyshape because x- or y-coordinate is too large.
